title: d

title: Re: Pathetic ripoff
content:
Frankly, I'm sick and tired of this kind of exploitive ripoff. Even a retail store never sold it at this high a price. As far as I can tell, the game's freeware.

Why get ripped off when you can do a google search for keen6.zip and download it. If the keen6.zip file is above 500 kilobytes, it's the full thing. Usually, v1.0 gets posted but you can always come back to [url=http://dosclassics.com/keen/dl.php?id=of]dosclassics.com/keen/dl.php?id=of[/url] and download the v1.0 to v1.4 patch and the v1.4 to v1.5 patch and update the game accordingly.

title: Aye.
content:
That's what many of us do anyway. However, an original, decade-old hard copy of a Keen game is a rare find these days, and well worth the money if you've got it to spare. Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

A concerned member of the Preservation of Endangered Spleens Society
